fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, International co-operation and development, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
head_office_address: Muelle de la Aduana Edificio Lanzadera  Valencia
eu_initiatives: - Not yet, but mainly interested in DG Move, DG R&D and DG Climate Action initiatives.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
-To develop a faster and more energy-efficient ground transport system to move at 1000 km/h with reduced infrastructure cost: the hyperloop. 
-To create an international framework initiated by Europe to support the development of the hyperloop transport system, connecting private companies with public stakeholders to integrate implementation efforts, to define regulations and standards, and to assess development requirements.
relevant_communication:
-Agreement signed with European and Canadian hyperloop companies to cooperate towards hyperloop standarization and to work together with European institutions in this field. 
-Meetings with Spanish Ministry of Science (Mr. Pedro Duque) to foster hyperloop development at both national and European level. 
-Official public support of local Governor Mr. Ximo Puig (Valencia, Spain) to locate one of Europe's first hyperloop research test tracks of 2 km in Valencia.
